import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { error } from 'console'; import { response } from 'express'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); this.eventos = [ { Tema: 'Angular', Local: 'São Paulo - SP' }, { Tema: '.NET 5', Local: 'Curitiba - PR' }, { Tema: 'JavaScript', Local: 'Floranopolis - SC' } ] } }
